body: Womanish Words pays tribute to the late educator Dr. Keva Bethel: "Bahamian women of my generation can be especially proud of her and grateful to her for a life and career that inspired us to reach for greatness in a man's world."
original_body: Womanish Words pays tribute to the late educator Dr. Keva Bethel: "Bahamian women of my generation can be especially proud of her and grateful to her for a life and career that inspired us to reach for greatness in a man's world."
title: Bahamas: Dr. Keva Bethel Dies
